title: Bitter sweet
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Victor Saville and W S. Van Dyke
brief_description: On the eve of her wedding to a priggish Londoner, a Victorian girl and her dashing music teacher elope to Vienna, where he hopes to sell his music. Cast includes Jeanette MacDonald, Nelson Eddy, George Sanders. Original play, music and lyrics by Noel Coward.
creator_credit_for_label: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Victor Saville and W S. Van Dyke
